title: Common Architecture Language Model Controls
description: Controls model requirements for domains. For example, a security domain contains a series of control requirements

control-requirement-url.description: The requirement schema that specifies how a control should be defined

control-config.description: The configuration of how the control requirement schema is met

description.description: A description of a control and how it applies to a given architecture

items.description: The detail of a how a specified control is structured and (if it currently does) is configured to meet the requirement
